physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Left abdominal pain accompanied by diarrhea; no hematochezia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Abdominal pain alleviated by August 14, 2023; pain disappeared by August 22, 2023.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: CECT scans showed that the splenic vein became a fibrotic cord.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Slight decrease in thrombus extension noted on August 22, 2023, with a subsequent transition to a fibrotic cord by September 26, 2023.
